alert.note: Alert for Anson; Hoke; Moore; Richmond; Scotland (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 7:43PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Moore, Scotland, southeastern Anson, Richmond and southwestern Hoke Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Hamlet, or 8 miles northwest of Laurinburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laurinburg, Southern Pines, Rockingham, Pinehurst, Hamlet, Aberdeen, Hoffman, Pinebluff, Ellerbe and Dobbins Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
